The Fire Plane

The Fire Plane is the home of Tingma, created by herself to seal her destructive power away from the other Planes. Being a schism of The Material Plane, it is not entirely composed of fire, though the number of other substances which can retain a solid or even liquid state near to the intense heat of Tingma is few, and many of the inhabitants, which include fire elementals, are composed at least in part of living fire or magma.

The terrain is composed of splintered rock and magma flows, falling away from a central peak where the throne of Tingma sits.
